content.title: Peacemakers for Kids and Youth
content.description: Is peace impossible? That depends on you.

image1.alt: Five teenagers talking in a classroom.

content.text1: This year, through our annual Peacemakers campaign, we want to not only raise the money necessary to support life-changing peacebuilding projects, but we also want to inspire you to take action.

button1.description: Introduction to our Peacemakers campaign for Kids and Youth and watch video button.

content.text1: What does justice look like and how can we take meaningful action to work towards peace in our communities and around the world? Check out the resources below for activities you can do with your family.

image1.alt: A little girl baking muffins with her dad amazed at her skill

list.title: Ottawa Scone Baking
list.text: Join April when she goes live on The Meeting House Ottawa's Facebook page to share all her scone-related tips and tricks. Get a tasty treat for your troubles. Suggested donation: $5 per viewer.

list.title: Ottawa Knitting with Jasmine
list.text: Jasmine Duckworth has kindly offered to teach us some knitting. Join us on Sunday, May 29 before church in Ottawa to learn to knit a dishcloth, repair your own knitwear, or drop something off to be repaired by Jasmine's expert hands.
list.imageAlt: Black and yellow graphic with the words Ottawa Knitting with Jasmine.
